thing-type.label: UDP Connected Nibe F1145 and F1245 Heat Pumps

parameter.name: hostName
parameter.label: Host Name
parameter.description: Network address of the NibeGW.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: UDP Port
parameter.description: UDP port to listening data packets from the NibeGW.

parameter.name: readCommandsPort
parameter.label: UDP Port for Read Commands
parameter.description: UDP port to send read commands to the NibeGW.

parameter.name: writeCommandsPort
parameter.label: UDP Port for Write Commands
parameter.description: UDP port to send write commands to the NibeGW.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: States how often a refresh shall occur in seconds.

parameter.name: enableReadCommands
parameter.label: Enable Read Commands
parameter.description: Enable read commands to read additional variable from heat pump which are not included to data readout messages. This is experimental feature, use it at your own risk!

parameter.name: enableWriteCommands
parameter.label: Enable Write Commands
parameter.description: Enable write commands to change heat pump settings. This is experimental feature, use it at your own risk!

parameter.name: enableWriteCommandsToRegisters
parameter.label: Registers List for Write Commands
parameter.description: Comma separated list of registers, which are allowed to write to heat pump. E.g. 44266, 47004

parameter.name: throttleTime
parameter.label: Throttle Incoming Data
parameter.description: Throttle incoming data read out messages from heat pump. 0 = throttle is disabled, otherwise throttle time in milliseconds.
